author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ALBERTO MOVING WESTWARD OVER THE WESTERN GULF OF MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAINS, COASTAL FLOODING, AND GUSTY WINDS FORECAST ALONG THE COASTS OF TEXAS AND NORTHEASTERN MEXICO THROUGH THURSDAY...
summary:
...ALBERTO MOVING WESTWARD OVER THE WESTERN GULF OF MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAINS, COASTAL FLOODING, AND GUSTY WINDS FORECAST ALONG THE COASTS OF TEXAS AND NORTHEASTERN MEXICO THROUGH THURSDAY...
 As of 1:00 PM CDT Wed Jun 19
 the center of Alberto was located near 22.2, -95.1
 with movement W at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 995 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
